response.overview: The film is an impression of a day in the life of a Bulgarian Roma family. Raised in a caravan, the protagonists have settled in the countryside and are trying to cope with the responsibilities of running a farm. In a broader context, it attempts to tell the story of a person's attempt to adapt to new living conditions, to question their value in isolation from tradition, and above all, to express a longing for what is irretrievably lost.
response.title: Agor Dromesko. U kresu wędrówki
